attributes.action: M.Ps to reflect the views of their constituents not a Party Line
attributes.additional_details:
After Monday's vote 24/10/11 on Europe most M.Ps flagrantly voted against the wishes of the majority of the Electorate. As M.Ps they are suppoosed to represent the views of their constituents on importanht issues not pander to the Leader of their Party.
Being an M.P is the only Employment in Britain where the employee can disregard the wishes of the employer and get away with it year after year.
M.Ps should be forced to uphold the views of their constituents, that's why we elect them.
